page.title: 18Transport in Shaugh Prior.
page.content: In our area there are very few means of transport. One kind of transport is the {Bus Service}.Most of the children travel to school on the bus.We get on the bus at a small village called{ {Wotter},the bus comes at 9.25am and we get to school at 9.30am.We go home on the half past three bus.Other means of transport are cars,motorbikes, or bicycles.Sometimes children ride their bicycles to school,it saves bus fares and it is good fun. Two children used to ride a horse to school.At the moment the bus fare to go from Wotter to Shaugh Prior is 20pence.Many { {lorries from the English China Clay {Works}travel through Shaugh Prior.Sometimes our school goes on coach trips,a coach is a much more comfortable way of travelling.
